content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #80949 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
(meta question) IIUC the euca crate is included in crater runs. What's the decision pipeline to include a crate?
I'm not sure how to evaluate this, I'll invoke the mcve angels to see if a repro can be provided

apiraino said:

(meta question) IIUC the euca crate is included in crater runs. What's the decision pipeline to include a crate?

All crates are included in crater runs if I'm not mistaken unless otherwise put on some sort of disallow list
Hmm, definitely a bad bug, but it seems like it's hard to reproduce - though it seems it's been caused by a new refactoring to drop ordering. This one is tough - P-high?
I don't quite get the error behind but a regression on the borrow checker is probably bad enough for a P-high
